Model.BugReport

Class Tag

  • java.lang.Object
    • Model.BugReport.Tag
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Assigned, Closed, Duplicate, New, NotABug, Resolved, UnderReview

    public abstract class Tag
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class containing base functionality for tags. All tag types inherit from this class.

    • Constructor Summary

      Tag()

    • Method Detail

      • addPatch

        protected void addPatch(BugReport bugReport,
                        Patch patch)
                 throws ReportErrorToUserException
        Protected method for assigning a patch, Method is different for each tag.
        Parameters:
        bugReport - The bug report to assign the patch to.
        patch - The patch to assign.
        Throws:
        ReportErrorToUserException - Assigning the patch is not possible.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Bugreport or patch is null.

        Parameters:
        bugReport - The bug report to assign the test to.
        test - The test to assign.
        Throws:
        ReportErrorToUserException - Assigning the test is not possible.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Bugreport or test is null.

      • assignDeveloper

        protected void assignDeveloper(BugReport bugReport,
                               Developer developer)
                        throws ReportErrorToUserException
        Protected method for assigning a developer. Method is different for each tag.
        Parameters:
        bugReport - The bug report to assign the developer to.
        developer - The developer to assign
        Throws:
        ReportErrorToUserException - Assigning a developer is not possible.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Developer or bugreport is null.

      • canChangeToTag

        public boolean canChangeToTag(java.lang.Class<? extends Tag> tag)
        Method for checking if from this tag can be switched to the given one.
        Parameters:
        tag - The tag that the user wants to change to.
        Returns:
        True if the tag can be changed from this tag to te given one.

      • changeTag

        protected void changeTag(BugReport bugReport,
                         Tag tag)
                  throws ReportErrorToUserException
        General method for changing a tag of some bug report. Can be overridden.
        Parameters:
        bugReport - the bug report of which the tag has to be changed
        tag - the new tag for the specified bug report
        Throws:
        ReportErrorToUserException - if the operation is not allowed to be executed due to system restrictions.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - BugReport or tag is null.

      • setSelectedPatch

        protected final void setSelectedPatch(BugReport bugReport,
                                      Patch patch)
                               throws ReportErrorToUserException
        Method to let the subclasses have access to set the selected patch of the specified bug report.
        Parameters:
        bugReport - The bug report of which to set the selected patch.
        patch - The selected patch in the list of all the patches of that bug report.
        Throws:
        ReportErrorToUserException - Something went wrong while selecting the patch with the given index.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - BugReport is null.

      • setSolutionScore

        protected final void setSolutionScore(BugReport bugReport,
                                      int score)
                               throws ReportErrorToUserException
        Method to let the subclasses have access to set the score of the given solution of the specified bug report.
        Parameters:
        bugReport - The bug report of which to set the selected patch.
        score - The score to which to set the selected bug report.
        Throws:
        ReportErrorToUserException - The score given is not a valid score.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - BugReport is null.

      • updateTagSpecificFields

        protected void updateTagSpecificFields(BugReport bugReport)
                                throws ReportErrorToUserException
        General method to update fields of the bug report that will be set when bug report is set to this tag.
        Parameters:
        bugReport - The bug report of which to update the fields.
        Throws:
        ReportErrorToUserException - Something went wrong during the update of the fields.
